entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow mixed with rain changing to rain this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near plus 2. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Light snow or rain. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Rain changing to light snow in the morning and ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 in the morning then light in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
